content:
You're all set for the bachata festival! I'm sure you'll have an amazing time learning from experienced instructors, social dancing with fellow enthusiasts, and immersing yourself in the bachata culture. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further guidance.

Remember to take plenty of photos, share your experience with your friends and family, and practice what you learn to continue improving your skills. And who knows, maybe Luna will even get to see some bachata moves when you get back!

¡Disfruta el festival de bachata!
